name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Block NSFW posts from Reddit at work

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sometimes you browse reddit at work. We get it... we do it too. But randomly clicking a NSFW post isn't worth getting fired over...

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Yep, we know your browse reddit at work. We do too.

But it's frustrating to see NSFW works while browsing reddit at work. You don't want to "accidentally" click a NSFW post just as your boss is walking by.

A random click on a NSFW post is not worth getting fired over.

So we built this Chrome Extension. It hides all NSFW posts from reddit. It works like a charm, and we love it.

Install it today.

Donations welcome:
